Package org.talend.sdk.component.api.configuration

Annotation Type Option

@Target({FIELD,PARAMETER}) @Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface Option
Mark a configuration field (injected in a Emitter or Processor method parameter or nested in one of these method parameters).

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements
    Modifier and Type
    Optional Element
    Description
    String
    value
    The value of the option, if empty it will use the classname + field value (ex: com.company.ConfigModel.data).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    MAX_DURATION_PARAMETER
    Mark parameter of streaming PartitionMapper where PartitionMapper.infinite() == true and PartitionMapper.stoppable() == true that it contains max duration in milliseconds between start read the value and end expected type of the parameter is long or int or their boxed equivalents
    static final String
    MAX_RECORDS_PARAMETER
    Mark parameter of streaming PartitionMapper where PartitionMapper.infinite() == true and PartitionMapper.stoppable() == true that it limits amount of records that connector can read.

  • Field Details

    • MAX_DURATION_PARAMETER

      static final String MAX_DURATION_PARAMETER
      Mark parameter of streaming PartitionMapper where PartitionMapper.infinite() == true and PartitionMapper.stoppable() == true that it contains max duration in milliseconds between start read the value and end expected type of the parameter is long or int or their boxed equivalents
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MAX_RECORDS_PARAMETER

      static final String MAX_RECORDS_PARAMETER
      Mark parameter of streaming PartitionMapper where PartitionMapper.infinite() == true and PartitionMapper.stoppable() == true that it limits amount of records that connector can read. expected type of the parameter is long or int or their boxed equivalents
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Element Details

    • value

      String value
      The value of the option, if empty it will use the classname + field value (ex: com.company.ConfigModel.data).
      Returns:
      the value of the option.
      Default:
      ""
